textTemplates.text:
An Error Occurred with Your "DY Screen Flow - Update Communication Prefs" Flow

You've received this email because an error occurred while your "DY Screen Flow - Update Communication Prefs" flow was running. Debug this flow in Flow Builder.

Error element debug (FlowActionCall).
Debug: end


Open Flow


Flow Error Details

Flow Details

Flow API Name: testnewmp__DY_Screen_Flow_Update_Communication_Prefs
Type: Flow
Version: 5
Status: Draft
Org: {!$Organization.Id} ({!$Organization.Name})


Flow Interview Details

Interview Label: DY Screen Flow - Update Communication Prefs
Interview GUID: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}
Current User: {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
Start time: {!$Flow.InterviewStartTime}
Duration: 0


How the Interview Started
